mapper.insert: INSERT INTO popcon.review (popup_id, review_content, review_score, review_quality, review_cost, review_type, review_design, review_trendy, review_new, review_kindness, review_area, review_car, review_concept, review_clean, review_gift, review_date, review_like, user_id, review_parent_id) VALUES (#{popupId}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewScore}, #{reviewQuality}, #{reviewCost}, #{reviewType}, #{reviewDesign}, #{reviewTrendy}, #{reviewNew}, #{reviewKindness}, #{reviewArea}, #{reviewCar}, #{reviewConcept}, #{reviewClean}, #{reviewGift}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), #{reviewLike}, #{userId}, #{reviewParentId})
mapper.update: UPDATE popcon.review SET review_content = #{reviewContent}, review_score = #{reviewScore}, review_quality = #{reviewQuality}, review_cost = #{reviewCost}, review_type = #{reviewType}, review_design = #{reviewDesign}, review_trendy = #{reviewTrendy}, review_new = #{reviewNew}, review_kindness = #{reviewKindness}, review_area = #{reviewArea}, review_car= #{reviewCar}, review_concept = #{reviewConcept}, review_clean = #{reviewClean}, review_gift = #{reviewGift}, review_date = #{reviewDate} WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM popcon.review_image WHERE review_id = #{reviewId} AND review_image_id = #{reviewImageId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM popcon.review WHERE review.popup_id = #{popupId} AND review_id = #{reviewId}

SELECT review_content, popup_id,review.user_id, review_date, review_like, review_quality, review_cost, review_type, review_design, review_trendy, review_new, review_kindness, review_area, review_car, review_concept, review_clean, review_gift, review_image.review_image_path as reviewImagePath, user.user_image_path as userImatePath, user.user_nickname as userNickname FROM review inner join review_image on review.review_id=review_image.review_id inner join user on review.user_id=user.user_id WHERE popup_id = #{popupId} ORDER BY review_date desc;

SELECT review.review_content, review.popup_id,review.user_id, review.review_date, review.review_like, review.review_quality, review.review_cost, review.review_type, review.review_design, review.review_trendy, review.review_new, review.review_kindness, review.review_area, review.review_car, review.review_concept, review.review_clean, review.review_gift, review_image.review_image_path as reviewImagePath, user.user_image_path as userImagePath, user.user_nickname as userNickname FROM review inner join review_image on review.review_id=review_image.review_id inner join user on review.user_id=user.user_id WHERE popup_id = #{popupId} ORDER BY review.review_id desc limit 9;

SELECT review_content, user_id, review_date, review_like, review_quality, review_cost, review_type, review_design, review_trendy, review_new, review_kindness, review_area, review_car, review_concept, review_clean, review_gift FROM popcon.review ORDER BY review_like;
mapper.update: UPDATE popcon.review SET review_like = review_like + 1 WHERE popup_id = #{popupId}
UPDATE popcon.review SET review_like = review_like - 1 WHERE popup_id = #{popupId}
